name: book-it-search-engine-mern-api
description: A fully functioning Google Books API search engine built refactor into a GraphQL Apollo Server API from a RESTful API. The app is built using the MERN stack, with a React front end, MongoDB database, and Node.js/Express.js server and GraphQL API. It's allow users to save book searches to the back end.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: Nikita 'Nik' Sharpio
